name: barebones-project-template
description: A project template for web with the absolute basics set up.

scripts.scss-parse: postcss src/styles/main.scss --parser postcss-scss --no-map --use postcss-advanced-variables postcss-nested postcss-import autoprefixer --output src/styles/main.css
scripts.scss-parse:watch: postcss src/styles/main.scss --parser postcss-scss --no-map --use postcss-advanced-variables postcss-nested postcss-import autoprefixer --output src/styles/main.css --watch

author: ioakeimo
